overview: Night 2 of 2, captured December 19th 2021 at a sold-out Chase Center in its hometown of San Francisco, Metallica celebrates its 40th anniversary with a career-spanning concert that puts into perspective the iconic metal bandâ€™s legacy, importance and influence.
